project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python script that generates a random password meeting user-defined criteria for length and character types.

task.name: Implement password generation logic that includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
Make the password length configurable by the user through command-line input.
Write tests to verify the password generation functionality.
Execute tests to ensure that the password meets the required criteria and functions correctly.
